snippet.title: Cirno VS Remilia —— New Touhou Fan Game Early Gameplay 「 Touhou Hero of Ice Fairy 」
snippet.description:
「 東方アイスフェリー勇者記～Touhou Hero of Ice Fairy 」
is a Touhou Fan game developed by the new Doujin developer team "GAMEPULSE 遊戲脈衝", This game combines two types of [2D side scroller RPG] and [Bullet Hell]. Players will be put in the role of popular Touhou character Crino against other Touhou characters who will appear as BOSSes, and beat them all to achieve the final victory.

Follow us on Twitter to keep informed of our new updates：
https://twitter.com/TouhouGamePulse

BGM used :
Our own.
